name: AuditApp_Attributes_ChangesForObject
query:
SELECT  
	      datetime(OM.DateTime, 'localtime') 'Operation DT'	  
        , ST.SystemName 'System'
        , OP.Name 'Operation'
        , AT.Name 'Process'
        , U.Name 'Actor'
		, AU.AttributeName 'Attribute'
		, AU.ValueOld 'Old'
        , AU.ValueNew 'New'
FROM AttributeUpdates AU
INNER JOIN ObjectMutations OM ON OM.ID = AU.ObjectMutationID
LEFT JOIN Operations OP ON OP.ID = OM.OperationID
LEFT JOIN Activities AC ON AC.ID = OM.ActivityID
LEFT JOIN ActivityTypes AT ON AT.ID = AC.ActivityTypeID
LEFT JOIN Objects O ON O.ID = OM.ObjectID
LEFT JOIN SystemTables ST ON ST.ID = O.SystemTableID
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID = AC.UserID
WHERE O.ID = $Key1
ORDER BY OM.DateTime DESC
